title: In which order should I read the 'Mitch Rapp' book series by Vince Flynn? - Quora

response.answer_text: My advice would be to read them in this order to understand even the small references completely : American assassin (#1)Kill shot(#2)Term limits (Mitch is not there in this, although the events are mentioned in later book, Awesome book btw ;) )Transfer of power(#3)Third option(#4) (Events of term limits are referred in this)Separation of power(#5)Executive power(#6)Memorial day(#7)Consent to Kill(#8)Act of treason(#9)Protect and defend(#10)Extreme measures(#11)Pursuit of Honor(#12)Last man (#13)The survivor(#14)Order to kill(#15)Enemy of the state(#16)Red war(#17)Lethal Agent(#18)

American AssassinKill ShotTransfer of PowerThird OptionSeparation of PowerExecutive PowerMemorial DayConsent to KillAct of TreasonProtect & defendExtreme MeasuresPursuit of HonorThe Last manThe SurvivorOrder to kill
